title: Smart Data Models - WindMechIEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Two mass model.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.2.1.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindMechIEC

WindGenTurbineType3IEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind turbine Type 3 model with which this wind mechanical model is associated. Default: None

WindTurbineType1or2IEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind generator type 1 or 2 model with which this wind mechanical model is associated. Default: None

WindTurbineType4bIEC.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Wind turbine type 4B model with which this wind mechanical model is associated. Default: None

cdrt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Drive train damping (. It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

hgen.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Inertia constant of generator (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

hwtr.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Inertia constant of wind turbine rotor (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0

kdrt.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Drive train stiffness (). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0.0
